body: Hi! After adding windows and constructions to the userCustomEPlibrary.idf I'm enjoying having all the needed materials within my gh/HB-file. Every HBSurface got connected to its individual materials - and adapted. But the HB-Childsrf-component can't find the specific materials. The userCustomEPlibrary.idf is identic in two directories (c:ladybug and c:user/appdata/roaming/...). How it come? Attached you find the custom library and the *.gh-file. Thank you very much for your support! D [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Sh7zTInlQpvIO2-6OviasA31Z5Rb0S2UYbwARuHxOjo7ZZi6n74R1YaMlE8BycfhS7w7Sey3aWhNxVH*cpP6cjUEg0*lmffo/getmaterialschildsurface.jpg)
topic: custom idf made - but only childsrf can't find custom materials
